feed.title: Making NYC Streets Safer - Analyzing Traffic Accidents Dataset
feed.subtitle: This webpage aims to raise awareness about traffic accidents in New York City and explore ways to make the streets safer for everyone. We will dive into the latest traffic accidents dataset and analyze the trends, patterns, and factors that contribute to these accidents. By understanding the data, we hope to identify potential solutions and initiatives that can help reduce the number of traffic accidents and improve road safety in NYC.
